p: Recently, some researchers disclosed that EOs independently act on inhibition of mycotoxin biosynthesis without/mild reducing effect on the fungal growth. The researchers reported that EOs cease the formation of precursors for mycotoxin biosynthesis (acetyl-CoA, the main precursor of aflatoxin biosynthesis) [ 62] and in other way, down-regulate the mycotoxin biosynthesis transcription factors, viz. PKS13 and PKS4 in zearalenone biosynthesis [ 35], acOTApks,acOTAnrps and acpks in OTA biosynthesis [ 59], and aflR, aflT, aflD, aflM, and aflP in aflatoxin B 1 biosynthesis [ 68].
